Updated to be more compatible with the latest iOS version.

We have removed all tokens, pestering popups and stupid life savers. Restart the level as many times you want, without being thrown back. 

We have also added a continue button to restart just before where you got killed. You might have to watch a little ad for this.. Oh, well, the rest is free.. ;)

You're welcome!
